subject: Angular Application at ${contact.companyName}
text:
Hi ${contact.name},
I am writing to express my interest in potential front-end developer opportunities at ${contact.companyName}. With experience in modern front-end technologies, including Angular, JavaScript, React, and UI/UX design, I am eager to contribute to a team that values innovation and user-centric development. 
My expertise includes developing responsive web applications, optimizing performance, and ensuring seamless user experiences through accessible and scalable design principles.
I have attached my resume for your consideration. Please let me know if any current or upcoming opportunities align with my skills. I would appreciate the chance to discuss how I can contribute to your team. 

Resume: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EB7sm0s2JdGwiux5YC6yiQYeTxyi5wTN/view?usp=drivesdk
Portfolio: https://architjain808.github.io/Hiarchit/ 

Regards, 
Archit Jain  
+91-8476849984`
